title: Almost PF DIN Display
author: Andrea Doria

comments.content: It looks like a mix of **[PF Din Display Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133754/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Parachute%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=PF%20DinDisplay%20Pro%20-%20Regular&fid=50eeb1302a3ce373e5994e37a1ca843e&fsize=60&text=Knusprige%20Waffelrollchen%20gefullt%20Cappuccino&wrap=2)** (the /e looks like this in your sample) with **[PF Din Text Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133754/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Parachute%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=PF%20DinText%20Pro%20-%20Regular&fid=665340254dee90c2a8bee6827a3ac1bf&fsize=60&text=Knusprige%20Waffelrollchen%20gefullt%20Cappuccino&wrap=2)** (your /r is present here).
